dataModels.title: All Data Models
dataModels.info: A data model organizes data elements and specifies how they relate to one another and by which properties they are described.

vocabularies.title: Controlled Vocabularies
vocabularies.info: Controlled vocabularies are hierarchical or non-hierarchical lexica of reference terms. Due to their normative or standardized nature, controlled vocabularies improve data quality and make database searching more efficient than free-text fields.

searchTips.title: Search tips
searchTips.exactPhrases: Use quotation marks for exact phrases: "down the rabbit hole"
searchTips.booleanSearch: Use AND, OR, NOT for boolean searches: Alice AND Wonderland
searchTips.wildcards: Use wildcards: Alice* will match Alice, Alices, etc.

pager.inputTooltip: Enter the page number and apply with the Enter key.

hint.questionMark:
question mark? can be used as wildcard symbol for a single character.
Example: be?r will find beer but also bear
hint.asterisk:
asterisk* can be used as a wildcard symbol for zero, one or multiple characters.
Example: b*r will find beer but also bear
hint.quotationMarks:
"quotation marks" searches for the whole pattern.
Example: "Lorem ipsum" will find texts with exact content Lorem ipsum
hint.readMore: Read more in the user guide

footer.aboutDspApp:
DSP-APP is built with Angular, styled with Material · DSP-API and Sipi under the hood

Supported by Swiss Academy of Humanities and Social Sciences, Swissuniversities and Swiss National Science Foundation.
